name: crownicles_rest_ws_middleware
description: Rest API middleware package of Crownicles

scripts.start: pnpm run build:protobuf && tsc && node dist/RestWs/src/index.js
scripts.build:protobuf: mkdir -p src/@types && mkdir -p dist/RestWs/src/@types && pbjs -t static-module -p protobufs --force-number -o dist/RestWs/src/@types/protobufs-client.js protobufs/from_client/**/*.proto && pbts -o src/@types/protobufs-client.d.ts dist/RestWs/src/@types/protobufs-client.js && pbjs -t static-module -p protobufs --force-number -o dist/RestWs/src/@types/protobufs-server.js protobufs/from_server/**/*.proto && pbts -o src/@types/protobufs-server.d.ts dist/RestWs/src/@types/protobufs-server.js && sed -i 's/export interface \([A-Za-z0-9]\+\) {/export interface \1 extends FromClientPacket {/g' src/@types/protobufs-client.d.ts && sed -i 's/export interface \([A-Za-z0-9]\+\) {/export interface \1 extends FromServerPacket {/g' src/@types/protobufs-server.d.ts && sed -i '1s/^/export interface FromClientPacket {}\n/' src/@types/protobufs-client.d.ts && sed -i '1s/^/export interface FromServerPacket {}\n/' src/@types/protobufs-server.d.ts
